name: KeyCoord
description:
KeyCoord is a game made for the Minimalism Game Jam where you have to guide the player using multiple keys that act as coordinates, you must grab the key and then go to the door to get to the next level.

All of the levels (15 for now) are possible but some are very difficult, its fine if you cant finish them all, just try to have fun!

All the assets where made by me.

I hope you like the game and feel free to let any feedback you like.
